me.koenn.cenchants.data

Class JSONFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.koenn.cenchants.data.JSONFile

  • public class JSONFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a .json file. Used for easy interaction with the file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSONFile(java.io.File file)
      Creates a JSONFile from a File.
      JSONFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates a JSONFile from a file path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getFromJSON(java.lang.String key)
      Get a value from the JSONFile using it's key.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getJSON()
      Get the full JSONObject from the file.
      void save()
      Save the JSONFile to disk.
      void setInJSON(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Set an entry in the JSONFile.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JSONFile

        public JSONFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a JSONFile from a file path.
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to the file to create the JSONFile from.

      • JSONFile

        public JSONFile(java.io.File file)
        Creates a JSONFile from a File.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save()
        Save the JSONFile to disk.

      • setInJSON

        public void setInJSON(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.Object value)
        Set an entry in the JSONFile. Does not auto-save the file.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the entry.
        value - the value of the entry.

      • getFromJSON

        public java.lang.Object getFromJSON(java.lang.String key)
        Get a value from the JSONFile using it's key.
        Parameters:
        key - key to get the value for.
        Returns:
        value associated with the key.

      • getJSON

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject getJSON()
        Get the full JSONObject from the file.
        Returns:
        JSONObject of the file.
